2.verse: Munthu wina akutamande, koma osati wekha; mlendo akakutamanda, ndiponi koma osati ndi pakamwa pako.

3.verse: Mwala ndi wolemera ndipo mchenganso ndi wolemera kwambiri, koma makani a chitsiru ndi oposa zonsezo kulemera kwake.

4.verse: Mkwiyo umadzetsa nkhanza ndipo kupsa mtima kumachititsa zoopsa. Koma nsanje imachita zoopsa zopambana.

5.verse: Kudzudzula munthu poyera nʼkwabwino kuposa chikondi chobisika.

6.verse: Munthu amene amakukonda ngakhale akupweteke zili bwino, koma mdani wako amakupsompsona mwachinyengo.

7.verse: Iye amene wakhuta amayipidwa ndi chisa cha uchi, koma kwa munthu wanjala ngakhale chimene chili chowawa chimamukomera.

8.verse: Munthu amene wasochera ku nyumba kwake, ali monga mbalame imene yasochera pa chisa chake.

9.verse: Mafuta ndi zonunkhira zimasangalatsa mtima, ndipo kukoma mtima kwa bwenzi kwagona pa malangizo ake.

10.verse: Usasiye bwenzi lako ndiponso bwenzi la abambo ako, ndipo usapite ku nyumba ya mʼbale wako pamene wakumana ndi mavuto; mnzako wokhala naye pafupi amaposa mʼbale wako wokhala kutali.

11.verse: Mwana wanga, khala wanzeru, ndipo ukondweretse mtima wanga; pamenepo ine ndidzatha kuyankha aliyense amene amandinyoza.

12.verse: Munthu wochenjera akaona choopsa amabisala, koma munthu wopusa amangopitirira ndipo amakumana ndi mavuto.

13.verse: Utenge chovala cha munthu amene waperekera mlendo chikole; ngati chigwiriro chifukwa waperekera chikole mlendo wosadziwika.

14.verse: Ngati munthu apatsa mnzake moni mofuwula mmamawa kwambiri, anthu adzamuyesa kuti akutemberera.

15.verse: Mkazi wolongolola ali ngati mvula yamvumbi.

16.verse: Kumuletsa mkazi wotereyu zimenezi zili ngati kuletsa mphepo kapena kufumbata mafuta mʼdzanja.

17.verse: Chitsulo chimanoledwa ndi chitsulo chinzake, chomwechonso munthu amanoledwa ndi munthu mnzake.

18.verse: Amene amasamalira mtengo wamkuyu adzadya zipatso zake, ndipo iye amene amasamalira mbuye wake adzalandira ulemu.

19.verse: Monga momwe nkhope imaonekera mʼmadzi, chomwechonso mtima wa munthu umadziwika ndi ntchito zake.

20.verse: Manda sakhuta, nawonso maso a munthu sakhuta.

21.verse: Siliva amasungunulira mu uvuni ndipo golide mʼngʼanjo, chomwechonso munthu amadziwika ndi zomwe akudzitamandira nazo.

22.verse: Ngakhale utakonola chitsiru mu mtondo ndi musi ngati chimanga, uchitsiru wakewo sudzachoka.

23.verse: Uzidziwe bwino nkhosa zako momwe zilili. Kodi usamalire bwino ziweto zako?

24.verse: Paja chuma sichikhala mpaka muyaya, ndipo ufumu sukhala mpaka mibado yonse.

25.verse: Pamene udzu watha, msipu nʼkumera; ndipo atatuta udzu wa ku mapiri,

26.verse: ana ankhosa adzakupatsani chovala ndipo pogulitsa mbuzi mudzapeza ndalama yogulira munda.

27.verse: Mudzakhala ndi mkaka wambuzi wambiri kuti muzidya inuyo ndi banja lanu ndi kudyetsa antchito anu aakazi.

1.verse: Munthu woyipa amathawa ngakhale palibe wina womuthamangitsa, koma wolungama ndi wolimba mtima ngati mkango.

2.verse: Pamene mʼdziko muli kuwukirana, dzikolo limakhala ndi olamulira ambiri, koma anthu omvetsa ndi odziwa zinthu bwino ndiwo angakhazikitse bata mʼdzikolo nthawi yayitali.

3.verse: Munthu wosauka amene amapondereza osauka anzake ali ngati mvula yamkuntho imene imawononga mbewu mʼmunda.

4.verse: Amene amakana malamulo amatamanda anthu oyipa, koma amene amasunga malamulo amatsutsana nawo.

5.verse: Anthu oyipa samvetsa za chiweruzo cholungama, koma amene amafuna kuchita zimene Yehova afuna amachimvetsetsa bwino.

6.verse: Munthu wosauka wa makhalidwe abwino aposa munthu wolemera wa makhalidwe okhotakhota.

7.verse: Amene amasunga malamulo ndi mwana wozindikira zinthu, koma amene amayenda ndi anthu adyera amachititsa manyazi abambo ake.

8.verse: Amene amachulukitsa chuma chake polandira chiwongoladzanja chochuluka amakundikira chumacho anthu ena, amene adzachitira chifundo anthu osauka.

9.verse: Wokana kumvera malamulo ngakhale pemphero lake lomwe limamunyansa Yehova.

10.verse: Amene amatsogolera anthu olungama kuti ayende mʼnjira yoyipa adzagwera mu msampha wake womwe, koma anthu opanda cholakwa adzalandira cholowa chabwino.

11.verse: Munthu wolemera amadziyesa kuti ndi wanzeru, koma munthu wosauka amene ali ndi nzeru zodziwa zinthu amamutulukira.

12.verse: Pamene olungama apambana pamakhala chikondwerero chachikulu; koma pamene anthu oyipa apatsidwa ulamuliro, anthu amabisala.

13.verse: Wobisa machimo ake sadzaona mwayi, koma aliyense amene awulula ndi kuleka machimowo, adzalandira chifundo.

14.verse: Ndi wodala munthu amene amaopa Yehova nthawi zonse, koma amene aumitsa mtima wake adzagwa mʼmavuto.

15.verse: Ngati mkango wobuma kapena chimbalangondo cholusa ndi mmenenso amakhalira munthu woyipa akamalamulira anthu osauka.

16.verse: Wolamulira amene samvetsa zinthu ndiye amakhala wankhanza koma amene amadana ndi phindu lopeza mwachinyengo adzakhala ndi moyo wautali.

17.verse: Munthu amene wapalamula mlandu wopha munthu adzakhala wothawathawa mpaka imfa yake; wina aliyense asamuthandize.

18.verse: Amene amayenda mokhulupirika adzapulumutsidwa koma amene njira zake ndi zokhotakhota adzagwa mʼdzenje.

19.verse: Amene amalima mʼmunda mwake adzakhala ndi chakudya chochuluka, koma amene amangosewera adzakhala mʼmphawi.

20.verse: Munthu wokhulupirika adzadalitsika kwambiri, koma wofuna kulemera mofulumira adzalangidwa.

21.verse: Kukondera si kwabwino, ena amachita zolakwazo chifukwa cha kachidutswa ka buledi.

22.verse: Munthu wowumira amafunitsitsa kulemera koma sazindikira kuti umphawi udzamugwera.

23.verse: Amene amadzudzula mnzake potsiriza pake mnzakeyo adzamukonda kwambiri, kupambana amene amanena mawu oshashalika.

24.verse: Amene amabera abambo ake kapena amayi ake namanena kuti “kumeneko sikulakwa,” ndi mnzake wa munthu amene amasakaza.

25.verse: Munthu wadyera amayambitsa mikangano, koma amene amadalira Yehova adzalemera.

26.verse: Amene amadzidalira yekha ndi chitsiru, koma amene amatsata nzeru za ena adzapulumuka.

27.verse: Amene amapereka kwa osauka sadzasowa kanthu, koma amene amatsinzina maso ake adzatembereredwa kwambiri.

28.verse: Pamene anthu oyipa apatsidwa ulamuliro anthu amabisala, koma anthu oyipa akawonongeka olungama amapeza bwino.

1.verse: Munthu amene amawumitsabe khosi lake atadzudzulidwa kwambiri, adzawonongeka mwadzidzidzi popanda chomuchiritsa.

2.verse: Anthu olungama akamalamulira mʼdziko anthu amakondwa, koma ngati dziko lilamulidwa ndi anthu oyipa mtima anthu amadandaula.

3.verse: Munthu amene amakonda nzeru amasangalatsa abambo ake, koma woyenda ndi akazi achiwerewere amasakaza chuma chake.

4.verse: Mfumu imalimbitsa dziko poweruza mwachilungamo, koma mfumu imene imawumiriza anthu kuti ayipatse mphatso imawononga dziko.

5.verse: Munthu woshashalika mnzake, akudziyalira ukonde mapazi ake.

6.verse: Munthu woyipa amakodwa ndi machimo ake, koma wochita chilungamo amayimba lokoma.

7.verse: Munthu wolungama amasamalira anthu osauka, koma woyipa salabadira zimenezi.

8.verse: Anthu onyoza atha kuwutsa ziwawa mu mzinda, koma anthu anzeru amaletsa ukali.

9.verse: Ngati munthu wanzeru atsutsana ndi chitsiru, chitsirucho chimachita phokoso ndi kumangoseka ndipo sipakhala mtendere.

10.verse: Anthu okhetsa magazi amadana ndi munthu wangwiro koma anthu olungama amasamalira moyo wake.

11.verse: Munthu wopusa amaonetsa mkwiyo wake, koma munthu wanzeru amadzigwira.

12.verse: Ngati wolamulira amvera zabodza, akuluakulu ake onse adzakhala oyipa.

13.verse: Munthu wosauka ndi munthu wopondereza anzake amafanana pa kuti: Yehova ndiye anawapatsa maso onsewa.

14.verse: Ngati mfumu iweruza osauka moyenera, mpando wake waufumu udzakhazikika nthawi zonse.

15.verse: Ndodo ndi chidzudzulo zimapatsa nzeru koma mwana womulekerera amachititsa amayi ake manyazi.

16.verse: Oyipa akamalamulira zoyipa zimachuluka, koma anthu olungama adzaona kugwa kwa anthu oyipawo.

17.verse: Umulange mwana wako ndipo adzakupatsa mtendere ndi kusangalatsa mtima wako.

18.verse: Ngati uthenga wochokera kwa Yehova supezeka anthu amangochita zofuna zawo; koma wodala ndi amene amasunga malamulo.

19.verse: Munthu wantchito sangalangizidwe ndi mawu okha basi; ngakhale awamvetse mawuwo sadzatha kuchitapo kanthu.

20.verse: Ngakhale munthu wa uchitsiru nʼkuti ndiponi popeza chikhulupiriro chilipo kuposa munthu wodziyesa yekha kuti ndi wanzeru poyankhula.

21.verse: Ngati munthu asasatitsa wantchito wake kuyambira ali mwana, potsirizira adzapeza kuti wantchitoyo wasanduka mlowachuma wake.

22.verse: Munthu wamkwiyo amayambitsa mikangano, ndipo munthu waukali amachita zolakwa zambiri.

23.verse: Kunyada kwa munthu kudzamutsitsa, koma munthu wodzichepetsa amalandira ulemu.

24.verse: Woyenda ndi munthu wakuba ndi mdani wa moyo wake womwe; amalumbira koma osawulula kanthu.

25.verse: Kuopa munthu kudzakhala ngati msampha, koma aliyense amene amadalira Yehova adzatetezedwa.

26.verse: Anthu ambiri amafunitsitsa kuti wolamulira awakomere mtima, koma munthu amaweruzidwa mwachilungamo ndi thandizo la Yehova basi.

27.verse: Anthu olungama amanyansidwa ndi anthu achinyengo; koma anthu oyipa amanyansidwa ndi anthu a mtima wowongoka.

1.verse: Mawu a Aguri - Nawa mawu a Aguri mwana wa Yake wa ku Masa: Munthuyo anati kwa Itieli, “Inu Mulungu, ine ndatopa. Inu Mulungu, ine ndatopa. Ndalefukiratu.

2.verse: “Ine ndine munthu wopusa kuposa anthu onse; ndilibe nzeru zomvetsa zinthu zonga za munthu.

3.verse: Sindinaphunzire nzeru, ndipo Woyerayo sindimudziwa.

4.verse: Kodi ndani anakwera kumwamba ndi kutsikako? Ndani anafumbatapo mphepo mʼmanja mwake? Ndani anamanga madzi mʼchovala chake? Ndani anakhazikitsa mathero onse a dziko lapansi? Dzina lake ndani? Ndiwuze ngati ukudziwa! Ndipo mwana wake dzina lake ndani?

5.verse: “Mawu ali wonse a Mulungu ndi opanda cholakwika; Iye ndi chishango kwa amene amathawira kwa Iye.

6.verse: Usawonjezepo kanthu pa mawu ake, kuopa kuti Iye angadzakudzudzule ndi kukupeza kuti ndiwe wabodza.”

7.verse: “Inu Yehova, ndikukupemphani zinthu ziwiri musandimane zimenezo ndisanafe:

8.verse: Choyamba, mundichotsere kutali nane mabodza ndi chinyengo. Chachiwiri, ndisakhale mʼmphawi kapena munthu wachuma. Koma muzindidyetsa chakudya chondikwanira tsiku ndi tsiku

9.verse: kuopa kuti ndikakhuta kwambiri ndingayambe kukukanani, nʼkumanena kuti, ‘Yehova ndiye yaninso?’ Kuopanso kuti ndikakhala wosauka ndingayambe kuba, potero nʼkuyipitsa dzina la Mulungu wanga.”

10.verse: “Usamusinjirire wantchito kwa mbuye wake kuopa kuti angakutemberere ndipo iweyo nʼkupezeka wolakwa.”

11.verse: “Alipo ena amene amatemberera abambo awo, ndipo sadalitsa amayi awo.

12.verse: Pali ena amene amadziyesa okha oyera mtima komatu sanachotse zoyipa zawo.

13.verse: Pali ena ndi odzitukumula kwambiri, amene amakweza zikope modzitukumula.

14.verse: Pali ena amene mano awo ali ngati malupanga ndipo zibwano zawo zili ngati mipeni moti amadya amphawi ndi kuwachotsa pa dziko lapansi. Amachotsanso anthu osauka pakati pa anzawo.”

15.verse: “Msundu uli ndi ana aakazi awiri iwo amalira kuti, ‘Tipatseni! Tipatseni!’ ” “Pali zinthu zitatu zimene sizikhuta, zinthu zinayi zimene sizinena kuti, ‘Takhuta!’

16.verse: Manda, mkazi wosabala, nthaka yosakhuta madzi ndiponso moto womangoyakirayakira!”

17.verse: Aliyense amene amanyoza abambo ake, ndi kunyozera kumvera amayi ake, makwangwala a ku chigwa adzamukolowola maso ndipo mphungu zidzadya mnofu wake.

18.verse: Pali zinthu zitatu zimene zimandidabwitsa, zinthu zinayi zimene ine sindizimvetsetsa.

19.verse: Ndipo ndi izi: mmene chiwulukira chiwombankhanga mlengalenga; mmene iyendera njoka pa thanthwe; mmene chiyendera chombo pa nyanja; ndiponso mmene mwamuna achitira akakhala ndi namwali.

20.verse: Umu ndi mʼmene mkazi amachitira atachita chigololo: Atatha kudya ndi kupukuta pakamwa pake iye amanena kuti “Sindinachite kalikonse kolakwa.”

21.verse: Pali zinthu zitatu zimene zimanjenjemeretsa dziko lapansi, pali zinthu zinayi zimene dziko lapansi silingathe kuzipirira:

22.verse: Kapolo amene wasanduka mfumu, chitsiru chimene chakhuta,

23.verse: mkazi wonyozeka akakwatiwa ndiponso wantchito wamkazi akalanda mwamuna wa mbuye wake.

24.verse: Pali zinthu zinayi zingʼonozingʼono pa dziko lapansi, komatu ndi zochenjera kwambiri:

25.verse: Nyerere zili ngati anthu opanda mphamvu, komatu zimasungiratu chakudya chake nthawi ya chilimwe;

26.verse: mbira zili ngati anthu opanda mphamvu komatu zimakonza pokhalapo pawo mʼmiyala;

27.verse: dzombe lilibe mfumu, komatu lonse limakhala mʼmagulumagulu poyenda.

28.verse: Buluzi ungathe kumugwira mʼmanja komatu amapezeka mʼnyumba za mafumu.

29.verse: “Pali zinthu zitatu zimene zimayenda chinyachinya, pali zinthu zinayi zimene zimayenda monyadira:

30.verse: Mkango umene uli wamphamvu kuposa nyama zonse, ndipo suthawa kanthu kalikonse.

31.verse: Tambala woyenda chinyachinya, mbuzi yayimuna, ndiponso mfumu yoyenda pakati pa anthu ake.

32.verse: “Ngati wakhala ukupusa ndi kumadzikweza wekha, kapena ngati wakhala ukukonzekera zoyipa, ndiye khala kaye chete, uganizire bwino!

33.verse: Paja pakutha mkaka mafuta amapangidwa, ndipo ukapsinya mphuno, magazi amatuluka, ndipo mikangano imakhalapo ukalimbikira kukwiya.”

1.verse: Mawu a Mfumu Lemueli - Nawa mawu a mfumu Lemueli wa ku Massa amene anamuphunzitsa amayi ake:

2.verse: Nʼchiyani mwana wanga? Nʼchiyani mwana wa mʼmimba mwanga? Nʼchiyani iwe mwana wanga amene ndinachita kupempha ndi malumbiro?

3.verse: Usapereke mphamvu yako kwa akazi. Usamayenda nawo amenewa popeza amawononga ngakhale mafumu.

4.verse: Iwe Lemueli si choyenera kwa mafumu, mafumu sayenera kumwa vinyo. Olamulira asamalakalake chakumwa choledzeretsa

5.verse: kuopa kuti akamwa adzayiwala malamulo a dziko, nayamba kukhotetsa zinthu zoyenera anthu osauka.

6.verse: Perekani chakumwa choledzeretsa kwa amene ali pafupi kufa, vinyo kwa amene ali pa mavuto woopsa;

7.verse: amwe kuti ayiwale umphawi wawo asakumbukirenso kuvutika kwawo.

8.verse: Yankhula mʼmalo mwa amene sangathe kudziyankhulira okha. Uwayankhulire anthu onse osiyidwa pa zonse zowayenera.

9.verse: Yankhula ndi kuweruza mwachilungamo. Uwateteze amphawi ndi osauka.

10.verse: Mathero: Mkazi Wangwiro - Kodi mkazi wangwiro angathe kumupeza ndani? Ndi wokwera mtengo kuposa miyala yamtengowapatali.

11.verse: Mtima wa mwamuna wake umamukhulupirira ndipo mwamunayo sasowa phindu.

12.verse: Masiku onse a moyo wake mkaziyo amachitira mwamuna wake zabwino zokhazokha osati zoyipa.

13.verse: Iye amafunafuna ubweya ndi thonje; amagwira ntchito ndi manja ake mwaufulu.

14.verse: Iye ali ngati sitima zapamadzi za anthu amalonda, amakatenga chakudya chake kutali.

15.verse: Iye amadzuka kusanache kwenikweni; ndi kuyamba kukonzera a pa banja pake chakudya ndi kuwagawira ntchito atsikana ake antchito.

16.verse: Iye amalingalira za munda ndi kuwugula; ndi ndalama zimene wazipeza amalima munda wamphesa.

17.verse: Iye amavala zilimbe nagwira ntchito mwamphamvu ndi manja ake.

18.verse: Iye amaona kuti malonda ake ndi aphindu, choncho nyale yake sizima usiku wonse.

19.verse: Iye amadzilukira thonje ndipo yekha amagwira chowombera nsalu.

20.verse: Iye amachitira chifundo anthu osauka ndipo amapereka chithandizo kwa anthu osowa.

21.verse: Iye saopa kuti banja lake lifa ndi kuzizira pa nyengo yachisanu; pakuti onse amakhala atavala zovala zofunda.

22.verse: Iye amadzipangira yekha zoyala pa bedi pake; amavala zovala zabafuta ndi zapepo.

23.verse: Mwamuna wake ndi wodziwika pa chipata cha mzinda, ndipo amakhala pakati pa akuluakulu a mʼdzikomo.

24.verse: Iye amasoka nsalu zabafuta nazigulitsa; amaperekanso mipango kwa anthu amalonda.

25.verse: Mphamvu ndi ulemu zimakhala ngati chovala chake; ndipo amaseka osaopa zamʼtsogolo.

26.verse: Iye amayankhula mwanzeru, amaphunzitsa anthu mwachikondi.

27.verse: Iye amayangʼanira makhalidwe a anthu a pa banja lake ndipo sachita ulesi ndi pangʼono pomwe.

28.verse: Ana ake amamunyadira ndipo amamutcha kuti wodala; ndipo mwamuna wake, amamuyamikira nʼkumati,

29.verse: “Pali akazi ambiri amene achita zinthu zopambana koma iwe umawaposa onsewa.”

30.verse: Nkhope yachikoka ndi yonyenga, ndipo kukongola nʼkosakhalitsa; koma mkazi amene amaopa Yehova ayenera kutamandidwa.

31.verse: Mupatseni mphotho chifukwa cha zimene iye wachita ndipo ntchito zake zimutamande ku mabwalo.
